ref: 10681 *rājanī -- : rāyaṇ, ryāṇ f. ʻ the tree ʼ, rāyṇ f. ʻ the berry ʼ.

10681 *rājanī ʻ the tree Mimusops kauki ʼ. [Cf. rājanya- m. = kṣīrikā -- ʻ name of a tree ʼ ~ kṣīrī -- ʻ name of M. kauki and other plants with a milky sap ʼ (rajanī -- f ʻ name of various plants ʼ lex.) and by pop. etym. rājādana -- m. Suśr., n. ʻ its fruit ʼ lex.]
Pk. rāyaṇī -- f. ʻ Mimusops kauki ʼ; O
G. rāiṇi f. ʻ a partic. fruit tree ʼ,
G. rāyaṇ f. ʻ a kind of tree and its berry ʼ.
